definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl
sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Synthetic resin of acrylate was prepared with solution polymerization.
sentences.chinese: 用溶液聚合法制備丙烯酸酯合成樹脂。

sentences.english: PUA has good wear resistance and flexibility advantages.
sentences.chinese: 聚氨酯丙烯酸酯具有耐磨性好，柔韌性好的優點。

sentences.english: The polyacrylate nano-particle has been prepared by use of emulsion polymerization technology.
sentences.chinese: 通過乳液聚合，製備了聚丙烯酸酯納米粒子。

sentences.english: The acrylate was copolymerized with the second monomer.
sentences.chinese: 尋找一種第二單體與丙烯酸酯共聚。

sentences.english: The synthesis method of stiffening agent was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了利用丙烯酸酯核殼共聚乳液生產硬挺劑的方法。

sentences.english: Lipidoids were synthesized by addition of acrylamides or acrylates to amines.
sentences.chinese: 類脂質，通過胺和丙烯酰胺或者丙烯酸酯反應合成。

sentences.english: The conductive mechanism of copper powder acrylate adhesive composite was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 從理論上討論了銅粉丙烯酸酯膠粘劑的導電機理。

sentences.english: The synthesis and properties of medical emulsion acrylic pressure sensitive adhesive were investigated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 敘述了醫用丙烯酸酯乳液壓敏膠的合成與性能。

sentences.english: Epoxy acrylates are prone to yellowing.
sentences.chinese: 環氧丙烯酸酯會逐漸黃變。

sentences.english: The properties of acrylate emulsion can be modified by organosilicon.
sentences.chinese: 有機硅能改性丙烯酸酯乳液的綜合性能。

sentences.english: In this paper a new synthesis of Trimethylol propyl triacrylate was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了三羥甲基丙烷三丙烯酸酯新的合成方法。

sentences.english: Both the oxidation and polymerization of acrylic ester containing ether bond are much easier than without.
sentences.chinese: 帶醚鍵的丙烯酸酯氧化和聚合快。

sentences.english: The Guanxingao patch was prepared by acrylic pressure sensitive adhesive as matrix.
sentences.chinese: 以丙烯酸酯壓敏膠爲基質製備冠心膏貼片。

sentences.english: Toa Acron is the brand name of producing ACM in Tope Company Japan.
sentences.chinese: 是日本透杯公司生產的丙烯酸酯橡膠的商品名稱。

sentences.english: Influence factors on the molecular weight of acrylic resin during solution polymerization were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了溶液聚合過程影響丙烯酸酯樹脂分子量的因素。

sentences.english: In this paper, the copolymer emulsion of acrylates with epoxy resin was prepared and characterized.
sentences.chinese: 研究了環氧改性丙烯酸酯乳液的合成工藝。
